More Reasons to Love Laragon

Tools designed to save your time

Auto SSL

Automatically generates valid SSL certificates for virtual domains. Enables HTTPS development easily and aligns local environments with production standards.

Easy Database Management

Integrated HeidiSQL for managing MySQL/MariaDB. Supports phpMyAdmin. Automatically creates databases when initializing new applications, streamlining the development workflow.

Deep Configuration Customization

Quick access to edit core configuration files such as php.ini, my.ini, httpd.conf, and nginx.conf directly from the context menu. Full control over the environment.

Ready to code faster?

Join thousands of developers using Laragon to speed up their web development workflow every day.

System Requirements: Windows 7/8/10/11 (64-bit)

More Reasons to Love Laragon

Reliable

Automatic recovery & backup. Crash-proof MySQL.

Disposable

Delete old versions/services by just removing the folder.

Multi-Version

Switch PHP/Node/Java versions on the fly.

Flexible

Customize configurations in user templates easily.

Easy-to-use

Zero config required. Just extract and run.

Isolated

Run multiple Laragon instances independently.
